Text:
This is bad... We're in the deepest part of the cave. 
No escapin’ from here even if we tried.

...I'll play decoy and keep him distracted. You can
use that opening to get outta here.

What?! At times like this you have to think of saving
your own skin, so—

If he's strong enough to take out a whole village,
then I'm sure he's worth hunting! He's gonna be
my prey now!
Y-You...

You just keep outta the way. Once I get to fighting,
I don't stop!
O-Okay—
Grrr...
What a big boy... This is gonna be fun!
Y-You sure about this?
Oh, I'm sure, and you wanna know why?
Gwoaaarrr!!!
You wanna know why?!
YOU WANNA KNOW WHYYY?!
Because I'm strong!!!
Hrrraaah!!!
Groar!!!
Wh-Whoa...
G-Grrragh...
W-Watch out! Wounded beasts are...!
I know!
*deep breath*
He's mine now!
Grrr...rrrr...gh...
...And that's that!
It only took three hits... How weak!

(I was excited to see how strong the bear would be
since it tore apart a whole village—)
(But even Gamma is way tougher than this!)

I-I had no idea you were so strong... Sorry for
underestimating you based on your looks.

What's the matter? Why's your tail curled up between
your legs like that?

P-Please, could you take me...no, can you become the
leader of my pack?
Leader of your pack, huh...

(From the day we're born, every therianthrope
dreams of becoming pack leader someday—)
...I can't be your pack leader.

But why? Because you're strong enough to go it alone?
Can't imagine someone like you not at the head of her
own pack.

The truth is...there's leaders stronger than me that
I obey... Two of them, in fact.

I'm actually a member of their pack, but I just ran
off on my own because we got in a fight.

O-Oh, I see... I find it hard to believe any of our
kind could be stronger than you, though...
They're not therianthropes. Just a human and an elf.
What...?!

I'm strong, so I can make it on my own. But...now I
realize that running with my pack is more fun.
So I'm going back! I've got a pack to go home to!

...Ahh! I feel so much better now! All those cloudy,
gloomy feelings are gone!

Okay... Feels like a waste, but it's not like
I can stop you...
Havin' a pack to call home is a wonderful thing, too.

Well, take care. Though I kinda doubt anyone as
strong as you has anything she needs to be
careful of.

Mhm, you take care too. The bear is yours, so eat up
and get better!
...Huh? Why did I leave again?
Ah, whatever! Time to go home!
I'm home!
Delta...! Welcome back!

I've been walking forever so I'm starving. 
Lady Alpha, I want some breakfast!

I bet you do. I'll make you plenty of whatever you'd
like to eat.

Really?! Maybe running away from home sometimes
isn't such a bad thing!

(If it would make Alpha less of a meanie, I'm all set
to run away lots more often—)

Oh, we both know you wouldn't be gone for long.
So we can hardly call this "running away from
home" now, can we?

But things went right back to the way they always
were... And just when I thought she was starting to
be nice!
